item.title: Porthcawl Travel Guide (Glamorgan/South Wales/Wales/United Kingdom/Britain and Ireland/Europe)
item.description: Discover the beauty of Porthcawl with this comprehensive travel guide which provides information on places to visit, best things to do, hiking/biking routes, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture and customs, safety, transportation options and nearby destinations. Plan your trip to Porthcawl today!
